title: Error when saving data to cloud.
description: There's an issue when users attempt to save their data to the cloud.
acceptance_criteria: User should be able to save data seamlessly.
how_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to Save options.
2. Choose 'Save to cloud'.
3. Observe error.

title: Enhance UI for profile settings.
description: Users have requested an improved UI for profile settings.
acceptance_criteria: UI should be intuitive and user-friendly.
how_to_reproduce:
1. Go to profile settings.
2. Attempt to change UI preferences.
3. Check if changes are reflected.

title: System crashes on file upload.
description: Uploading files of size greater than 5MB causes system crash.
acceptance_criteria: System should not crash on file upload.
how_to_reproduce:
1. Click on 'Upload File'.
2. Choose file > 5MB.
3. Observe crash.

title: Add dark mode option.
description: Users want a dark mode for nighttime use.
acceptance_criteria: Option to switch between light and dark mode should be available.
how_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to settings.
2. Look for 'Dark Mode' toggle.
3. Switch between modes.
